trans-unit.source: Provides a customizable activity designer surface for users to visually modify on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Gir egendefinerte aktiviteten utformingsoverflaten for brukere å endre visuelt på en arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The FreeformActivityDesigner allows users to modify how an activity appears on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]FreeformActivityDesigner lar brukere endre hvordan en aktivitet skal vises på en arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: When you associate FreeformActivityDesigner with a custom activity class using the `Designer` attribute, the custom activity's appearance is different from other activities when a user drops the custom activity onto a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Når du knytte FreeformActivityDesigner til en egendefinert klassen ved hjelp av `Designer` attributtet for egendefinert aktiviteten utseendet er forskjellig fra andre aktiviteter når en bruker faller egendefinerte aktiviteten på en utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Once FreeformActivityDesigner displays an activity on the design surface, users can draw connectors to other activity designers and resize the designer within the parameters defined by the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Når FreeformActivityDesigner viser en aktivitet på utformingsoverflaten, kan brukere tegne koblinger til andre aktiviteten utviklere og størrelse på designer i parametere som er definert av utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Users can only add connectors to the custom activity because the FreeformActivityDesigner is associated with the top-level activity in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Brukere kan bare legge til koblinger til egendefinert aktivitet fordi FreeformActivityDesigner er knyttet til på øverste nivå aktiviteten i en arbeidsflyt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> som tilgjengelighetsprogrammer bruker til å justere programmet Brukergrensesnittet for brukere som har hemninger.

trans-unit.source: If no `AccessibleObject` is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen `AccessibleObject` som er tilordnet til kontrollen, opprettes en ny forekomst av en.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the `AccessibilityObject` property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke hente eller angi den `AccessibilityObject` -egenskapen, må du legge til en referanse til samlingen tilgjengelighet installert med .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]tilgjengelige objekter, se aktiv tilgjengelighet i MSDN-biblioteket.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> tilknyttet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Adds a connector to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en kobling til den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: AddConnector is called when a user adds a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: AddConnector kalles når en bruker legger til en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>til <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plassering for å starte koblingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plassering for å fullføre koblingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that was added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> som ble lagt til i <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: source or target contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: sourceeller target inneholder en referanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The property for source or target contains a reference ().
trans-unit.target: The property for source or target contains a reference ().

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is not the container for the connector to add.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> er ikke beholder for koblingen for å legge til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is resized automatically when a user resizes the designer's child designers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> endrer størrelse automatisk når brukeren endrer størrelse av designer underordnede utviklere.

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSize, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir Autostørrelse, oppsettet for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>er oppdatert.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is resized automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> endrer størrelse automatisk; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the margin size to render around the child designers when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir margstørrelsen på å gjengi rundt underordnede utviklere når den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> endrer størrelse automatisk.

trans-unit.source: The default size of AutoSizeMargin is a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object with dimensions of 40 pixels by 40 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Standardstørrelsen på AutoSizeMargin er en <xref:System.Drawing.Size>objekt med dimensjonene for 40 x 40 piksler.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property associated with the current workflow theme is set to `true`, AutoSizeMargin settings are half the height and half the width of the grid size.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>knyttet til gjeldende arbeidsflyten tema er satt til `true`, AutoSizeMargin innstillinger er halvparten av høyden og halv bredde i rutenettet størrelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSizeMargin, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir AutoSizeMargin, oppsettet for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>er oppdatert.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the margin to render around the child designers of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer størrelsen på margen å gjengi rundt de underordnede som utformet den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> innstillinger for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of AutoSizeMode allows the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to grow as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Standard virkemåte for AutoSizeMode gjør det <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>å øke til etter behov for å passe til innholdet, men ikke redusere mindre enn verdien for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSizeMode, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir AutoSizeMode, oppsettet for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>er oppdatert.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default setting is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardinnstillingen er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Brings the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the top of the z-order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Plasser det angitte <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> til toppen av z-rekkefølgen for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: BringToFront modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as its top visible child designer.
trans-unit.target: BringToFront endrer z-rekkefølgen for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>til å vise den angitte <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>som den øverste synlige underordnet designer.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the top of the z-order when a user selects it.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å vise en designer på toppen av z-rekkefølgen når en bruker velger den.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call BringToFront.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`må være i en underordnet av den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>før du kaller BringToFront.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, BringToFront throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, oppstår BringToFront en <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to bring to the top of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> til å koble til toppen av z-rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerinneholder en referanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerfinnes ikke i den samling.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can create a connection between the specified connection point on a source child activity designer and the specified connection point on a target child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan opprette en tilkobling mellom angitte tilkoblingspunktet for en datakilde underordnet Aktivitetsdesigner og tilkoblingspunktet for angitt på et mål underordnet Aktivitetsdesigner.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the source activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> for kontroll av datakilden Aktivitetsdesigner.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the target activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> for kontroll av målet Aktivitetsdesigner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can draw a connector between source and target activity designers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan tegne en kobling mellom kilde og mål aktiviteten utviklere; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be collapsed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan skjules på en arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: CanExpandCollapse always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid CanExpandCollapse `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be collapsed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan være skjult; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a user can visually resize the specified child activity designer in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om en bruker kan visuelt endre størrelsen på det angitte underordnede Aktivitetsdesigner i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, CanResizeContainedDesigner returns `true` if `containedDesigner` is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Med mindre overstyres i en avledet klasse CanResizeContainedDesigner returnerer `true` Hvis `containedDesigner` er <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Other types of designers cannot be resized.
trans-unit.target: Andre typer utviklere kan ikke endres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> å se.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user can visually resize the specified activity designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en bruker kan visuelt endre størrelsen på den angitte aktivitet utformeren; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> is added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> legges til i <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorAdded event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A>er registrert representanten hendelsesbehandlingen for ConnectorAdded-hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user changes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> locations associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren endrer den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plasseringer som er knyttet til en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> vises av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: En kobling endres når en bruker endrer den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>plasseringer i en av en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>objektet.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorChanged event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A>er registrert representanten hendelsesbehandlingen for ConnectorChanged-hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user removes a connector from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en bruker fjerner en kobling fra den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorRemoved event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>er registrert representanten hendelsesbehandlingen for ConnectorRemoved-hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of connectors that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en skrivebeskyttet samling av koblingene som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.
trans-unit.target: En kobling er linjen som vises i en arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten som kobler én Aktivitetsdesigner til en annen.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection that contains all <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En skrivebeskyttet samling som inneholder alle <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> objekter som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a connector between the two specified connection points.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kobling mellom de to angitte tilkobling punktene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plassering for å starte koblingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plassering for å fullføre koblingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that was created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> som ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer is being disposed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the designer is being finalized.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis designer er fjernet; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis designer er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukere kan dra og tegne koblinger i frihåndsform aktiviteten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukere kan dra og tegne koblinger i frihåndsform aktiviteten utformingsoverflaten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be visually resized on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan endres visuelt på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode>, EnableVisualResizing returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>er satt til `true` og <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode>, EnableVisualResizing returnerer `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: In all other conditions EnableVisualResizing returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Alle betingelsene EnableVisualResizing returnerer `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be visually resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan være visuelt skalert; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den første valgbar objektet i navigasjon rekkefølgen på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: FirstSelectableObject returns the first child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection, or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the collection count is zero.
trans-unit.target: FirstSelectableObject returnerer første underordnede designer i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>samling, eller `null` referanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) Hvis samlinger er null.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det første valgbare objektet navigasjon rekkefølgen på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det første valgbare objektet som følger det angitte objektet i navigasjon rekkefølgen på gjeldende <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Object> in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref:System.Object>i rekkefølgen som navigasjon.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som bestemmer rekkefølgen navigering av designer.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Først valgbar som følger det obj parameter i rekkefølgen som navigasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av symboler som vises på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Glyphs returns a glyph for each connectable child designer found on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Symboler returnerer en variant for hver tilkobling underordnet designer funnet på <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"> </xref> som inneholder tegn som vises på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""></xref> at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer informasjon om den <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""> </xref> på de angitte koordinatene på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: HitTest checks whether the location has occurred on a connector or one of the child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: HitTest kontrollerer om plasseringen inntraff på en kobling eller en underordnet aktivitet utviklere.

trans-unit.source: If the HitTest occurs on a child activity that is being dragged to another location, HitTest returns information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, not the designer being moved.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår HitTest på en underordnet aktivitet som drar til et annet sted, HitTest returnerer informasjon om den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, ikke designer flyttet.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som inneholder koordinatene på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten kan samle inn informasjon fra.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified coordinates
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> på de angitte koordinatene

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `Initialize` adds a designer property extender to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> for it to use until the design surface is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: `Initialize`legger til en extender designer-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>som den skal bruke til utformingsoverflaten er ødelagt.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som å initialisere den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified read-only collection of activities to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte skrivebeskyttet objektsamlingen aktiviteter i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> på den angitte plasseringen på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> som angir plassering for å legge til aktivitetene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> skrivebeskyttet samling som inneholder aktivitetene til å legge til den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den siste valgbar objekt i navigasjon rekkefølgen på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: LastSelectableObject returns the last child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> does not contain any child designers.
trans-unit.target: LastSelectableObject Returnerer siste underordnede designer i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>egenskapen eller `null` referanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) Hvis den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>inneholder ikke en underordnet utviklere.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som siste valgbar objekt i rekkefølgen som designer navigasjon.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir plasseringen for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> i logiske koordinater.

trans-unit.source: When Location is set due to a user resizing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, the designer maintains the relative positions of its child designers.
trans-unit.target: Når plassering er angitt på grunn av en bruker endrer størrelse på den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, designer opprettholder den relative plasseringen av de underordnede utviklere.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""></xref> that represents the location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""> </xref> som representerer plasseringen for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> i logiske koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter minimumsstørrelsen innstillingene for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the smallest possible size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer den minste mulige størrelsen for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Moves activities to a specified location within the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Flytter aktiviteter til en angitt plasseringen i utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Location to move activities to.
trans-unit.target: Plassering for å flytte aktiviteter i.

trans-unit.source: Collection that contains the activities to move to `moveLocation.`
trans-unit.target: Samlingen som inneholder aktivitetene å flytte til`moveLocation.`

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Flytter angitt <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> til den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: MoveContainedDesigner sets new bounds for the moved designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: MoveContainedDesigner angir nye bindingene for flyttet designer og utfører alle nødvendige oppsettet operasjoner for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call MoveContainedDesigner.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`må være i en underordnet av den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>før du kaller MoveContainedDesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, MoveContainedDesigner throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, oppstår MoveContainedDesigner en <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to move.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> å flytte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the designer's new location.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som representerer den utformeren ny plassering.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerinneholder en referanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerfinnes ikke i den samling.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: En kobling endres når en bruker endrer den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>plasseringer i en av en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>objektet.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a child activity is added or deleted from its <xref uid="langword_csharp_Activities" name="Activities" href=""></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> når en underordnet aktivitet lagt til eller slettet fra den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Activities" name="Activities" href=""> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the added or removed activities.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om nye eller fjernet aktivitetene.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a connection has been established between two of its contained activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> når det er opprettet en tilkobling mellom to av de inneholder aktiviteten utviklere.

trans-unit.source: OnContainedDesignersConnected is called when a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> is drawn between the source on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> object's contained activity designers to target on a second contained activity designer.
trans-unit.target: OnContainedDesignersConnected kalles når en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>tegnes mellom kilden på én av de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>objektet er inneholdt aktiviteten utviklere skal gjelde for en andre inneholder aktiviteten utformer.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plassering for å starte koblingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plassering for å fullføre koblingen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is completed within the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> når dra slipp er fullført i grensene for utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> som definerer operasjonen hendelsen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> når dra slipp pågår, og er brukerens markøren i grensene for utformeren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> som definerer operasjonen hendelsen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed when the designer has the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en tast når designer er fokus på tastaturet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Utfører oppsettet oppgaver for å plassere visuelle indikatorer og underordnede utviklere på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som definerer operasjonen hendelsen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> have changed.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> når størrelsen på visuelle indikatorer om verktøy vises av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> er endret.

trans-unit.source: OnLayoutSize returns the size of the current bounding rectangle for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> when <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: OnLayoutSize returnerer størrelsen på det gjeldende avgrensende rektangelet for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>når <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize calculates and returns new size settings for the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>er satt til `true` og <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize beregner, og returnerer nye innstillingene for det avgrensende rektangelet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to true and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize returns <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>er satt til SANN, og <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>ikke er angitt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, returnerer OnLayoutSize <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som definerer operasjonen hendelsen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new size of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer den nye størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a user is visually resizing it at design time.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> når en bruker er visuelt endre størrelsen på utformingstidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing performs all resizing tasks on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>er satt til `true` og <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing utfører alle endre størrelse på aktiviteter på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing performs layout tasks, but no resizing tasks.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>er satt til `true` og <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing utfører oppsettet oppgaver, men ingen endring av størrelse oppgaver.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`, all contained designers retain their previous locations on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>er satt til `false`, alt utviklere beholde tidligere plassering på <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"> </xref> som definerer operasjonen hendelsen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> that its associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> som det tilknyttede temaet er endret.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, OnThemeChange always sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> property to an empty string and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> property to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Med mindre overstyres i en avledet klasse OnThemeChange alltid angir den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A>egenskapen til en tom streng og <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A>egenskapen `null` (`Nothing` i Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A> is set to `true`, the locations of each child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is snapped to the nearest grid line.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A>er satt til `true`, plasseringen av hver underordnede designer i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>festet til nærmeste rutenett.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that contains the updated theme property settings.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> som inneholder egenskapsinnstillingene oppdatert tema.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det angitte <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> fra den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: RemoveConnector deletes the specified connector from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A> collection and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: RemoveConnector sletter den angitte koblingen fra den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A>samlingen og kall den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> fjerne.

trans-unit.source: connector contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: connectorinneholder en referanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Resizes the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the dimensions of specified size.
trans-unit.target: Endrer størrelsen på den angitte <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> til dimensjoner med angitt størrelse.

trans-unit.source: ResizeContainedDesigner sets new bounds for the resized designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: ResizeContainedDesigner angir nye bindingene for skalert designer og utfører alle nødvendige oppsettet operasjoner for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call ResizeContainedDesigner.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`må være i en underordnet av den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>før du kaller ResizeContainedDesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, ResizeContainedDesigner throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, oppstår ResizeContainedDesigner en <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to resize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> endre størrelse på.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new dimensions of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer de nye målene for utformeren.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerinneholder en referanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerfinnes ikke i den samling.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the bottom of the z-order of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir det angitte <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> til bunnen av z-rekkefølgen for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: SendToBack modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as the bottom visible designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: SendToBack endrer z-rekkefølgen for den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>til å vise den angitte <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>som nederste synlige designer på utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the bottom of the z-order when a user deselects it.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å vise en designer nederst i z-rekkefølgen når en bruker, deaktiveres den.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call SendToBack.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`må være i en underordnet av den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>før du kaller SendToBack.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, SendToBack throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, oppstår SendToBack en <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to set to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> skal angis på baksiden av z-rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerinneholder en referanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerfinnes ikke i den samling.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> tegner koblinger i forgrunnen på utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a class that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, ShowConnectorsInForeground always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Med mindre overstyres i en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, ShowConnectorsInForeground returnerer alltid `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> tegner koblinger i forgrunnen på utformingen surface; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
